abstract: Atlanta Braves catcher A J Pierzynski prepares for upcoming season, which could end with him just behind top five players on career list for games caught; has outlasted many of his fellow catchers, despite his reputation as most hated player in major leagues.
lead_paragraph: Pierzynski, of the Braves, has a reputation for being abrasive but is now an elder statesman, approaching the top five on the career list for games caught.

headline.main: A. J. Pierzynski, the Man They Love to Hate, Is Still Behind the Plate
headline.print_headline: Still Behind the Plate, the Man They Love to Hate

snippet: Pierzynski, of the Braves, has a reputation for being abrasive but is now an elder statesman, approaching the top five on the career list for games caught.
